hadith.chapterTitle: Virtues of Knowledge which is Learnt and Taught for the sake of Allah
hadith.body:
Abu Hurairah (May Allah be pleased with him) reported: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said, "When a man dies, his deeds come to an end except for three things: Sadaqah Jariyah (ceaseless charity); a knowledge which is beneficial, or a virtuous descendant who prays for him (for the deceased)."

[Muslim].

hadith.chapterTitle: - باب فضل العلم تعلما وتعليما لله
hadith.body: - وعنه قال‏:‏ قال رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم ‏:‏ ‏"‏إذا مات ابن آدم انقطع عمله إلا من ثلاث‏:‏ صدقة جارية ،أو علم ينتفع به، أو ولد صالح يدعو له‏"‏ ‏(‏‏(‏رواه مسلم‏)‏‏)‏‏.‏
